articles.title: Mary Poppins songwriter Richard Sherman dies aged 95 - BBC.com
articles.description: Richard Sherman composed scores for Mary Poppins and the Jungle Book, amassing Oscars and Grammy awards with his brother.
articles.content:
Composer Richard M Sherman, who wrote songs for Disney film classics such as Mary Poppins and Chitty Chitty Bang Bang has died aged 95 in Beverly Hills.
Sherman partnered with his late brother Rober… [+1983 chars]
